name: Whoisright
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: am i right
des: Need an impartial, yet definitive, answer as to whether you are indeed correct about something? Alexa’s got your back, every time. Simply ask: "Alexa, am I right?" and she'll back you up 100% of the time. For example, "I think we need a new 4K HDR TV, Alexa, am I right?" or "I'm pretty sure I did the washing up last night, Alexa, am I right?" or "I feel like today is going to be a great day, Alexa, am I right?" or "I don't agree with your socio political stance on this issue, I think the point I made earlier proved beyond a shadow of a doubt that I was correct, Alexa, am I right?"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
